archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0043
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I buy via a channel that requires delivery/pickup, I want to be able to choose the delivery/pickup option that best suits me

properties.value: OOTB Do you have a central warehouse or we should be able to present stock levels per each shop? Stock levels per shop needed. Expectation is that Comarch would integrate with external system (Brightpoint?). A the moment it is not sure if required APIs are available. Details to be discussed during AIF sessions.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
